title: BRIEF-Oil Search Expects Ministerial Statement On Papua LNG Gas Deal Review To Be Released on Sept 3
text:
BRIEF-Oil Search Expects Ministerial Statement On Papua LNG Gas Deal Review To Be Released on Sept 3

Commodities 17 minutes ago (Sep 03, 2019 10:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oil Search Expects Ministerial Statement On Papua LNG Gas Deal Review To Be Released on Sept 3 Sept 3 (Reuters) - Oil Search Ltd : * ANTICIPATED THAT A FORMAL MINISTERIAL STATEMENT ON REVIEW WILL BE RELEASED LATER TODAY * UNDERSTANDS THAT PNG CABINET (NATIONAL EXECUTIVE COUNCIL) MET YESTERDAY TO CONCLUDE REVIEW OF PAPUA LNG GAS AGREEMENT * UNDERSTANDS THAT PNG CABINET MET ON SEPT 2 TO CONCLUDE REVIEW OF PAPUA LNG GAS AGREEMENT

BRIEF-Oil Search Expects Ministerial Statement On Papua LNG Gas Deal Review To Be Released on Sept 3
description: BRIEF-Oil Search Expects Ministerial Statement On Papua LNG Gas Deal Review To Be Released on Sept 3
